item.description:
Come and join us for some coffee and conversation!

Jessie's has been on Federal Hill for several years now. The simpatica owner's Italian grandmother was "Jessie". Inside, you'll find comfortable seating area and a casual-elegant atmosphere.

They have desserts, gelato, coffee, tea and martinis (!). They do not, however, have sandwiches or other "lunch type" food.

So, we suggest having a big breakfast or an early lunch before or a late lunch after at one of Federal Hill's fine dining establishments.

There is never an obligation to purchase anything when you attend one of our events. We do want to make a bella figura, though, so please order at least a beverage!
item.how_to_find_us: Listen for Italian speakers and look for Italian dictionaries!

group.name: The Rhode Island Italian Language Meetup Group

item.name: Italian Conversation on The Hill
